links.*: The Book of Lost Tales Part One

wikitext.*:
The '''Bringing in of the Meats''' was a song sung by the children in the [[Cottage of Lost Play]] during dinner upon the mariner [[Eriol]]'s visit. After the song was sung, the lord of the dwelling, [[Lindo]], blessed the meal and the company.<ref>[[J.R.R. Tolkien]], [[Christopher Tolkien]] (ed.), ''[[The Book of Lost Tales Part One]]'', "I. [[The Cottage of Lost Play]]" p.16</ref>

== Lyrics ==
The song does not have any noted lyrics.
